content: Multitool grout sanding attachment Carbide sanding disc for the oscillating multitool, for sanding mortar and grout ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Multi-tool inserts- ### FEATURES:Features Increased versatility – quickly swap out sanding attachments to cover a range of base materials and applications More sustainable - adapt the Hilti SMT-6 multitool for different applications and base materials by switching inserts, without stocking multiple tools More flexibility – Starlock interface is compatible with all Starlock multitools on the market Easier to change inserts - Starlock compatible interface for a safer and more convenient tool-free insert change Applications Carbide sanding disc for mortar and grout Expand the range of applications possible with the Hilti multitool ### TECHNICAL DATA: Additional Accessory Information: Starlock Carbide grout-abrasive sanding disc, recommended for grout/mortar and plaster. 3 1/2 diameter. Technical Data | Additional Accessory Information | Starlock Carbide grout-abrasive sanding disc, recommended for grout/mortar and plaster. 3 1/2 diameter. ### ITEMS- 2368510 - Sanding disc SMT carbide tipp. - Package Size 1 pc
